page.title: 19A DAY AT SCHOOL
page.content: y sister and I set out for school at ten to nine. We go to school by car. At school I meet my friends then we line up for the bell. In my class the teacher takes the register then the secretary takes the dinner register. I stay sandwiches. We line up with our hymn books and go into assembly. After assembly we sometimes have a class lesson or we are split into groups.The bell goes for playtime at 10.30. I play with my friends. After play we work in our groups unless we have P.E. or games.If it is sunny we do games outside. At 12.00 we have dinner. We go back at 1.00. We sometimes have Reading 360 in which we read a story and then do work about it, or we might do Maths.Sometimes we have Art. On Wednesdays we have singing.We have another playtime at 2.15 and go home at 3.30.
